line_1: Gilding the Banks of Arno, or of Po;
line_2: Fruits, whose fair forms in bright succession glow

line_1: From Seyn and Loyre, to Rhone and Po,
line_2: In such a Case ne'er blame a Foe,

line_1: Or by the lazy Scheld or wandering Po;
From thence it reaches to the Banks of Po,
line_2: And the Loud Cannons let the Germans know.
